Welcome to Hot-STARSHIP's documentation!
========================================
Hot-STARSHIP is a tool for calculating heat transfer in spacecraft thermal protection systems.
It can calculate internal temperatures in ablative thermal protection systems as well as non-ablative
types such as corrugated sandwiches. For obtaining and a how-to on using the program, visit the software's
`Github page <https://github.com/nilsh7/Hot-STARSHIP>`_.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   Introduction
   modules
